mapper.update: UPDATE k_hybrid.mo_user_request SET noti_json = #{notiJson}::jsonb, noti_dt = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE uid = ( SELECT uid FROM k_hybrid.mo_user_request WHERE ml_id = #{mlId} ORDER BY request_dt DESC LIMIT 1 )
UPDATE k_hybrid.mo_user_request SET complete_dt = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE uid = ( SELECT uid FROM k_hybrid.mo_user_request WHERE ml_id = #{mlId} ORDER BY request_dt DESC LIMIT 1 )
mapper.select: SELECT uid , ml_id , nm , request_json , request_dt , noti_json , noti_dt , complete_dt FROM k_hybrid.mo_user_request WHERE 1 = 1 AND uid = #{uid}
SELECT req_uid , ml_id , cl_uid , no_uid , info , cause , reg_dt FROM k_hybrid.mo_user_response WHERE 1 = 1 AND uid = #{reqUid} AND ml_id = #{mlId}

SELECT a.request_json::TEXT AS req , info::TEXT AS res , cl_uid as cluid FROM k_hybrid.mo_user_request a INNER JOIN k_hybrid.mo_user_response b ON b.req_uid = a.uid WHERE a.noti_dt IS NOT NULL AND a.complete_dt IS NULL
